name: Comment
description: A comment on an item - for example, a comment on a blog post. The comment's content is expressed via the text property, and its topic via about, properties shared with all CreativeWorks.
title: Comment

fields.name: upvoteCount
fields.title: upvoteCount
fields.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

fields.name: parentItem
fields.title: parentItem
fields.description: The parent of a question, answer or item in general.

fields.name: downvoteCount
fields.title: downvoteCount
fields.description: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
